effect.shortEffect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.
effect.full: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier. If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.

description.diamond-pearl: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.
description.platinum: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.
description.black-white: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
description.black-2-white-2: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
description.x-y: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
description.sun-moon: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
description.sword-shield: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
